page.title: 20Our Domesday Group.
page.content: The work on this block was undertaken by the{pupils and staff of Crawford {Primary School.} We would like to thank the many people in the village who gave of their time to assist us in the collection of material. The collection of data for the project was most interesting and we discovered many things about our village.We looked at the history of Crawford and produced a tape/slide show on the village.We also made up our own play about William Wallace and his visit to the village. We found the Domesday Project very interesting and worthwhile.
